DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to investigate the efficacy and safety of ziprasidone in patients with first episode psychosis.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety With Ziprasidone in First-episode Psychosis
DOC.criteria: Patients who meet DSMIV criteria for first episode schizophrenia, schizophreniform disorder and schizoaffective disorder Patients with previously prescribed antipsychotic medication in 2 weeks or more patients with substanceinduced psychotic disorder, serious suicide attempt, neurological disorder, etc.
